videotemplate_highlights::clip_card_0::g: Show a location or the community that your story is about.
videotemplate_highlights::clip_card_7::g: Show something that sums up or concludes the story.
videotemplate_highlights::clip_card_4::g: Ask a relevant character to talk about the story.
videotemplate_highlights::clip_card_6::g: Ask another relevant character to talk about the story.
videotemplate_highlights::title: Highlights Video
videotemplate_highlights::clip_card_3::g: Show character(s) engaged in an activity relevant to the story.
videotemplate_highlights::text_card_0::t: This template will help you capture the best moments in your story. Highlights stories are structured less to illustrate a clear story line and more to show the peak moments or most dramatic aspects of the topic. In video, highlights stories are typically carried by narration.
videotemplate_highlights::clip_card_2::g: Show something that sums up the the importance of the story.
videotemplate_highlights::clip_card_1::g: Show the main character(s) in your story.
videotemplate_highlights::clip_card_5::g: Show the character engaged in an activity relevant to the story.
